attributes.action: LOOK INTO THE HOUSING OF PEOPLE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: HAS A MOTHER OF A 1 YEAR OLD WHO IS STUCK IN A FLAT I THINK GORDAN BROWN SHOULD THINK ABOUT GETTIN THE YOUNG GENERATION INTO HOUSES AND MOVE THE OAPS INTO BUNGALOWS

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
